stimulusHtml: A farm is experiencing extensive crop loss due to high rains causing overly saturated soils. Which of the following approaches would best help the farmer alleviate the problem?
choicesHtml: Amending the soil with sand to decrease the permeability of the soil
Amending the soil with clay to increase the water-holding capacity of the soil
Fertilizing the area with compost or green manure to improve soil structure and drainage
Using contour plowing to decrease soil erosion
